title: Bought Mystery Skin, then refunded champion?
body:
So I bought few mystery skins along with Shyvana using RP. The result was not that great, but then I saw a button saying "Refund" for Shyvana. I thought you couldn't refund the champion as long as you have the skins, but now I have Shyvana refunded, but 3 mystery skins for Shyvana. I'm confused... Please help!
-Xoo

replies.body: I'm not sure you described an actual problem? Did you not what to refund?

I believe his problem is that he refunded a champion for RP, but didn't get any of the other RP back for the skins he also purchased for that champion.

Not sure if this is intended behaviour of the store or not.
